fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every night, you receive a random role from the 25 most recently created town roles (from the limit in the game you're playing), "testing" it for the night. You gain its attack and defense stats, and are able to use any of its abilities. The attributes of that role also apply to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Town Investigatives will gain information as if you are Beta Tester (4317) no matter what, but any player who cannot win with you will recieve information as if you are the role you are testing.
